dialogText:
Welcome to Twidloo Registration!

Step 1: Fill in your email and password details.

• Use the campaign email provided
• Create a strong directory password
• Complete all required fields

Confirm Email
Make sure it matches the first email

Confirm Password
Must match the first password

Account Verification & Security

Step 2: Complete the security check and verification process.

• Verify your email address
• Complete any captcha challenges
• Review terms and conditions
